top_categories.workout_context: Glenwood Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Glenwood Gravel’s iowa rolling, local event demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Glenwood Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Glenwood Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Racing Glenwood Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Glenwood Gravel’s iowa rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Glenwood Gravel’s iowa rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Glenwood Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Glenwood Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
The varied gradients at Glenwood Gravel reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Every session at Glenwood Gravel intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Glenwood Gravel — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on iowa rolling gravel.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Glenwood Gravel’s 60 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Glenwood Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on iowa rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: iowa rolling, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and G Spot to prepare you for 60 miles of iowa rolling gravel in Glenwood, Iowa.
